text:
Purdue University
S TAT ION W B A A
LAFAYETTE. INDIANA
Mr. Harold Hill
NAEB Headquarters
14 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harold:
We are mailing today our School of the Air Bulletins
for this Fall and are using the list of addresses you so kindly
SENT US SOME TIME AGO. WE FIND SUCH A LIST MOST USEFUL, HENCE
I AM WONDERING IF YOU CAN SUPPLY US WITH ANOTHER TWO SETS OF
GUMMED LABELS FOR NAEB MEMBERS.
Nothing else new here. I still have not done anything
on the Public Relations Committee Report but I will get that to
SCHOOLEY BEFORE THE BOARD MEETS IN CHICAGO.
Are the Hills coming to Lafayette before school gets
UNDER WAY?
SINCERELY,
James S. Miles
Director, WBAA Radio Station
